evidence.claim: Gallagher Bassett utilizes AWS for cloud services in their platforms.
The company has implemented HIPAA-compliant processes for handling sensitive patient data.
Gallagher Bassett integrates EDI transactions using X12 formats for healthcare processing.
They employ FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in claims processing and eligibility verification with EDI and X12 transactions.
